  • Method Details

    • connect

      public static java.sql.Connection connect()
      Connects and logins to the database
      Returns:
      The connection to the database

    • login

      public static java.lang.String login​(java.lang.String username, java.lang.String pw) throws java.sql.SQLException
      Checks if the user and password match to the database entry
      Parameters:
      username - The username of the user which will log in
      pw - The password of the user
      Returns:
      The message which will be sent to the client. Can be:

      Can't connect to database

      User not found

      Wrong Password

      Logged in

      Throws:
      java.sql.SQLException

    • register

      public static java.lang.String register​(java.lang.String username, java.lang.String pw, java.lang.String email) throws java.sql.SQLException
      Inserts a user into the database
      Parameters:
      username - The desired username
      pw - The desired password
      email - User's email
      Returns:
      The message which will be sent to the client. Can be:

      Can't connect to database

      User Already Registered

      Registered Successfully

      Throws:
      java.sql.SQLException

    • checkUser

      public static boolean checkUser​(java.sql.Connection conn, java.lang.String username) throws java.sql.SQLException
      Checks if user is registered
      Parameters:
      conn - The connection to the database
      username - The username to check
      Returns:
      True if username is already in the database. False otherwise.
      Throws:
      java.sql.SQLException

    • isFriend

      public static int isFriend​(java.lang.String username, java.lang.String friend) throws java.sql.SQLException
      Checks if 'friend' is friends with 'username'
      Parameters:
      username - Username of the user
      friend - Username of the friend
      Returns:

      -1 if not friend.

      0 if friend request is pending.

      1 if friendship is mutual

      Throws:
      java.sql.SQLException

    • requestFriendship

      public static java.lang.String requestFriendship​(java.lang.String username, java.lang.String friend) throws java.sql.SQLException
      Creates a pending request in the database from 'username' to 'friend'
      Parameters:
      username - Username of the user asking for friendship
      friend - Username of the friend
      Returns:
      The message which will be sent to the client. Can be:

      User does not exist

      Already friends

      Already requested

      Request sent

      Throws:
      java.sql.SQLException

    • acceptFriendship

      public static java.lang.String acceptFriendship​(java.lang.String username, java.lang.String friend) throws java.sql.SQLException
      Accepts the friendship request
      Parameters:
      username - Username of the user who will accept the request
      friend - Username of the friend which sent the request
      Returns:
      The message which will be sent to the client. Returns "Accepted " + friend + "as friend":
      Throws:
      java.sql.SQLException

    • getFriendsList

      public static java.util.ArrayList<java.lang.String> getFriendsList​(java.lang.String username) throws java.sql.SQLException
      Retrieves the list of the user's friends from the database
      Parameters:
      username - The username of the user
      Returns:
      The list of the user's friends
      Throws:
      java.sql.SQLException

    • removeFriend

      public static java.lang.String removeFriend​(java.lang.String username, java.lang.String friend) throws java.sql.SQLException
      Deletes from the database the friend relationship specified
      Parameters:
      username - The username of the user asking for friend deletion
      friend - The username of the friend which will be removed form the user's friend list
      Returns:
      The message which will be sent to the client. Can be:

      friend + " removed from friends list"

      Error removing friend

      Throws:
      java.sql.SQLException

    • rejectFriendRequest

      public static java.lang.String rejectFriendRequest​(java.lang.String username, java.lang.String friend) throws java.sql.SQLException
      Deletes the pending friendship request from the database
      Parameters:
      username - The username of the user who wants to delete the entry
      friend - The username of the friend
      Returns:
      The message which will be sent to the client. Can be:

      Request removed

      Request not found

      Throws:
      java.sql.SQLException

    • incrementPlayedGame

      public static void incrementPlayedGame​(java.lang.String username, boolean won) throws java.sql.SQLException
      Increments the number of games played by 1. If the player won, also increments their won games. Shall be used after a game is completed
      Parameters:
      username - The username of the user
      won - If the user won the game
      Throws:
      java.sql.SQLException

    • getWonGames

      public static int getWonGames​(java.lang.String username) throws java.sql.SQLException
      Retrieves the number of won games from the database
      Parameters:
      username - The username of the user
      Returns:
      The number of won games
      Throws:
      java.sql.SQLException

    • getPlayedGames

      public static int getPlayedGames​(java.lang.String username) throws java.sql.SQLException
      Retrieves the number of played games from the database
      Parameters:
      username - The username of the user
      Returns:
      The number of played games
      Throws:
      java.sql.SQLException
